医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究表明诊断错误是死亡和残疾的主要原因美国国家医学院表示，改善医疗保健诊断是道德、专业和公共卫生的当务之急。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230717/Research-shows-diagnostic-error-as-a-leading-cause-of-death-and-disability.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230717/Research-shows-diagnostic-error-as-a-leading-cause-of-death-and-disability.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a7caee34-a6da-4065-8c32-be07ed3d48bf Mon, 17 Jul 2023 10:08:40 -0400 Research shows diagnostic error as a leading cause of death and disability
抗药物抗体是否会降低类风湿关节炎治疗的有效性？研究人员检查了抗药物抗体与类风湿关节炎治疗反应之间的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230717/Are-antidrug-antibodies-reducing-the-efficiency-of-rheumatoid-arthritis-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230717/Are-antidrug-antibodies-reducing-the-efficiency-of-rheumatoid-arthritis-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=511e9d93-81ea-48d5-9d09-970d1022e332 Mon, 17 Jul 2023 10:02:00 -0400 Are antidrug antibodies reducing the effectiveness of rheumatoid arthritis treatment?
感染关联：神经影像学揭示调查对痴呆风险的影响研究人员比较了痴呆症的神经影像标记物与常见感染的抗体之间的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230717/The-infection-connection-investigating-the-impact-on-dementia-risk-neuroimaging-reveals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230717/The-infection-connection-investigating-the-impact-on-dementia-risk-neuroimaging-reveals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=798234a2-1f50-496f-b208-04950c50849f Mon, 17 Jul 2023 09:13:00 -0400 The infection connection: investigating the impact on dementia risk, neuroimaging reveals
感染引起的认知能力下降：机制和潜在的治疗方法生物制剂通过不同的方式威胁人们的生命，其中之一就是损害认知。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230717/Infection-induced-cognitive-decline-Mechanisms-and-pottial-treatments.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230717/Infection-induced-cognitive-decline-Mechanisms-and-潜在-treatments.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5a3d6f6a-12d1-404c-9​​944-338389b1a70d Mon, 17 Jul 2023 09:09:30 -0400 Infection-induced cognitive decline: Mechanisms and potential treatments
AAIC 2023 上首次发布了县级阿尔茨海默病患病率估计值今天，在荷兰阿姆斯特丹举行的 2023 年阿尔茨海默病协会国际会议上和在线发布了美国 3,142 个县中首次县级阿尔茨海默病痴呆症患病率估计值。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230717/First-ever-county-level-estimates-of-Alzheimers-prevalence-released-at-AAIC-2023.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230717/First-ever-county-level-estimates-of-Alzheimers-prevalence-released-at-AAIC-2023.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6f6b28d3-5061-47b4-abec-021dc167d649 Mon, 17 Jul 2023 09:02:22 -0400 First-ever county-level estimates of Alzheimer's prevalence released at AAIC 2023
美国心脏协会呼吁对电子烟进行更多研究美国心脏协会今天在该协会的旗舰刊物上发表了一份新的科学声明，研究越来越多地揭示了使用电子烟的健康风险，并且需要更多的研究来了解电子烟可能对心脏和肺部产生的长期影响期刊流通量。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230717/American-Heart-Association-calls-for-more-research-on-e-香烟.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230717/American-Heart-Association-calls-for-more-research-on-e-香烟.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7b801f91-7479-4283-91ea-3825a78e0cd9 Mon, 17 Jul 2023 08:57:29 -0400 American Heart Association calls for more research on e-cigarettes
新的 EULAR 考虑要点可以帮助识别有银屑病关节炎风险的人从银屑病到银屑病关节炎的转变以及银屑病关节炎的早期诊断具有相当大的科学和临床意义。人们通常患有银屑病皮肤病十年或更长时间，然后才开始出现银屑病关节炎的关节受累。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230717/New-EULAR-points-to-consider-can-help-identify-people-at-risk-of-psoriatic-arthritis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230717/New-EULAR-points-to-consider-can-help-identify-people-at-risk-of-psoriatic-arthritis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a0175b82-4e18-4c87-a704-b6d0260b64d7 Mon, 17 Jul 2023 08:47:29 -0400 New EULAR points-to-consider can help identify people at risk of psoriatic arthritis
Omicron 亚变体 BA.5 可能导致更严重的疾病Omicron 衍生的病毒变种目前是造成全球大多数 SARS-CoV-2 感染的原因。与早期的病毒变种相比，Omicron 很少引起严重疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230717/Omicron-subvariant-BA5-can-cause-more-severe-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230717/Omicron-subvariant-BA5-can-cause-more-severe-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6fb07c82-adbe-419f-b3d8-9c4c6475c048 Mon, 17 Jul 2023 08:36:04 -0400 Omicron subvariant BA.5 can cause more severe disease
美国癌症长期幸存者的肿瘤和非肿瘤死亡率的相对负担是多少？在最近的一项研究中，研究人员估计了癌症长期幸存者的死亡风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230717/What-is-the-relative-burden-of-oncologic-and-nononcologic-mortality-among-long-term-survivors-of-cancer-in- the-US.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230717/What-is-the-relative-burden-of-oncologic-and-nononcologic-mortality-among-long-term-survivors-of-cancer-in- the-US.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4140da47-5492-4e65-a4d5-280019f97703 Mon, 17 Jul 2023 08:30:00 -0400 What is the relative burden of oncologic and nononcologic mortality among long-term survivors of cancer in the US?
气道上皮的作用：深入了解哮喘和慢性阻塞性肺病的发病机制研究讨论了气道上皮损伤和异常修复如何导致慢性阻塞性肺病（COPD）和哮喘。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230717/The-role-of-airway-epithelium-insights-into-asthma-and-COPD-pathogenesis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230717/The-role-of-airway-epithelium-insights-into-asthma-and-COPD-pathogenesis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=49f6b525-7fdd-4ac8-9b90-15471480f8e0 Mon, 17 Jul 2023 08:29:00 -0400 The role of airway epithelium: insights into asthma and COPD pathogenesis
